name: Blackjack Casino
overview: Blackjack Casino is a card game for the 8-bit Atari. A text-based blackjack game, where all controls are via the joystick. There is a $300 limit per game, and insurance pays double. Players can bet $1, 5, 25, or 100, and 5 cards win. The game was developed by Bill Zimmerman and published by APX in 1981.
